name: JUMP FACTORY
description:
My 2020 GMTK Game Jam submission.  Also my first game on this site.  It's a short platformer where you automatically jump if you're on the ground for about half a second.  There are three sections of increasing difficulty, and you need to collect the five circles in each section to progress to the next section.

For anyone interested, the tileset used is called "Minimal Industry Tiles", by surt on OpenGameArt.  The sound effects are miscellaneous public domain effects I've had lying around as long as I can remember.  The BGM was made by myself.
